title: "Bring-a-Mate" Doesn't work.
body:
I got my girlfriend to make an account, but when she goes to type my name in the "referee" space, it says "The account you specified could not be found."
I know my account exists, I've been using it for years. I've chosen the correct region, and checked the spelling a bunch of times. It's all there.
So what's wrong with your Bring-a-Mate system?
When will it be working?

replies.body:
Hi BRÜTÄL

Thanks for getting in touch.  We did find an issue with this part of the system last night, but it should be fixed this up now.

Can you confirm if it is working for you now?

Cheers
-Mindstar

Hey,
How do i best contact support? I had an email from them just 3 days ago where they were still saying "can't comment on features we haven't released yet" when I asked specifically about crediting NA referrals. I too haven't got either of the skins and I remember being at 9 people before we left for OCE :( Not sure about the IP, so I can't tell if anything has been credited.
